entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 04:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain near midnight then to light snow overnight. Freezing rain inland this evening. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
